mapper.insert:
SELECT JD_REPAY_PLAN_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
insert into JD_REPAY_PLAN (JD_ID, APPLICATION_NO, ISSUE, START_DATE, START_RATE_DATE, REFUND_DATE, END_DATE, REFUND_PRINCIPAL, REFUND_INTEREST, SURPLUS_PRINCIPAL, REFUND_SERVICE_CHARGE, INTEREST_PENALTY, OVERDUE_SERVICE, UP_TYPE, CHANGE_TYPE, CHANGE_REASON, TYPE, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_TIME, UP_DATE, UP_TIME) SELECT JD_REPAY_PLAN_SEQ.NEXTVAL jdId, T.* FROM(
SELECT #{item.applicationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.issue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.startDate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.startRateDate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.refundDate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.endDate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.refundPrincipal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.refundInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.surplusPrincipal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.refundServiceCharge,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.interestPenalty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.overdueService,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.upType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.changeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.changeReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.upDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.upTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} FROM DUAL
) T
mapper.update: update JD_REPAY_PLAN set APPLICATION_NO = #{applicationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISSUE = #{issue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, START_DATE = #{startDate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, START_RATE_DATE = #{startRateDate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REFUND_DATE = #{refundDate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REFUND_PRINCIPAL = #{refundPrincipal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REFUND_INTEREST = #{refundInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SURPLUS_PRINCIPAL = #{surplusPrincipal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REFUND_SERVICE_CHARGE = #{refundServiceCharge,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INTEREST_PENALTY = #{interestPenalty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OVERDUE_SERVICE = #{overdueService,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UP_TYPE = #{upType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANGE_TYPE = #{changeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANGE_REASON = #{changeReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UP_DATE = #{upDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UP_TIME = #{upTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where JD_ID = #{jdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select JD_ID, APPLICATION_NO, ISSUE, START_DATE, START_RATE_DATE, REFUND_DATE, END_DATE, REFUND_PRINCIPAL, REFUND_INTEREST, SURPLUS_PRINCIPAL, REFUND_SERVICE_CHARGE, INTEREST_PENALTY, OVERDUE_SERVICE, UP_TYPE, CHANGE_TYPE, CHANGE_REASON, TYPE, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_TIME, UP_DATE, UP_TIME from JD_REPAY_PLAN where JD_ID = #{jdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select JD_ID, APPLICATION_NO, ISSUE, START_DATE, START_RATE_DATE, REFUND_DATE, END_DATE, REFUND_PRINCIPAL, REFUND_INTEREST, SURPLUS_PRINCIPAL, REFUND_SERVICE_CHARGE, INTEREST_PENALTY, OVERDUE_SERVICE, UP_TYPE, CHANGE_TYPE, CHANGE_REASON, TYPE, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_TIME, UP_DATE, UP_TIME from JD_REPAY_PLAN
